eerie.tip.accessability_options: Accessability details can be in the playthrough readme
eerie.tip.keep_volume_high: Keep your volume high for the best experience. Don't worry, there aren't any loud jumpscares
eerie.tip.keep_rd_high: Keep your render distance for the best experience. Don't worry about the fog, you cannot affect the fog
eerie.tip.recipe_changes: You can see all recipe changes in the readme
eerie.tip.animal_feeding_trough: You can craft an Animal Feeding Through to breed animals automatically using 5 wooden Slabs in a bowl shape
eerie.tip.copper_tools: You can make tools out of copper
eerie.tip.chest_boat: You can craft boats with chests and you access its inventory with shift-right-click
eerie.tip.chests_away_from_creepers: Keep your chests away from creepers
eerie.tip.cobble_stone_recipes: Recipes that use Cobble Stone can take any kind of stone
eerie.tip.controller_support: Controller support can be enabled within the Midnight Controls mod
eerie.tip.craft_bone_meal: You can craft nine Seeds into a Bone Meal
eerie.tip.craft_gold_to_xp: You can craft Bottles O' Enchanting with one Empty Bottle under one Gold Ingot
eerie.tip.craft_lapis_to_xp: You can craft 8 Lapis around 1 Bottle O' Enchanting into 2 Bottles O' Enchanting
eerie.tip.craft_slime_balls: You can craft 9 Vines or 9 Lilly Pads into a Slime Ball
eerie.tip.crops_like_rain: Crops grow faster in the rain
eerie.tip.daytime_15_minutes: Daytime now last 15 minutes and nighttime 7.5 minutes, instead of the default 10/10
eerie.tip.drop_cave_torches: You can drop torches into caves to light them up
eerie.tip.et_store_lapis: Enchanting tables can store Lapis Lazuli
eerie.tip.feedback: Feedback is always appreciated, see Links on the Modrinth page
eerie.tip.fences_on_slabs: You can place fences on slabs and have a fence that is offset from the grid
eerie.tip.flashing_despawn: Items flash when they are about to disappear
eerie.tip.fog_is_dynamic: The fog is randomized each in-game day
eerie.tip.keep_clock: Keep a Clock in your hotbar at all times, it just takes 4 Gold and 1 Redstone to craft
eerie.tip.many_crafts_removed: Many crafting recipes have been removed
eerie.tip.max_entity_cramming: Max entity cramming is set to 50
eerie.tip.more_charcoal: Many, many blocks and items can be smelted into Charcoal
eerie.tip.nether_is_taller: The nether is taller than vanilla
eerie.tip.no_zombie_knockback: Zombies of all kind have essentially no knockback
eerie.tip.only_red_beds: All bed recipes give red beds
eerie.tip.pet_animals: You can pets your tamed animals
eerie.tip.rapid_place: You can rapidly place blocks by holding down right-click and dragging
eerie.tip.read_enchanted_books: You can read enchanted books just like normal books
eerie.tip.read_readme: Read the Playthough Readme if you haven't already
eerie.tip.right_click_harvest: You can harvest and replant crops by just right-clicking them
eerie.tip.seasons_exist: Seasons exist and will affect your food growth
eerie.tip.smelt_planks: You can smelt planks into charcoal, not just logs
eerie.tip.store_xp: You can capture and store your xp by holding an Empty Bottle, pressing shift, and right-clicking
eerie.tip.useful_bone_meal: Bone Meal can be used on almost anything
